level.heading: Special requirements of other city departments.
level.text: ยง 27-292.7 Special requirements of other city departments.--The commissioner upon good cause may waive the requirements of this subarticle for the construction of buildings or spaces, or for the alteration of existing buildings to meet the special requirements of other city departments in regard to any of the following: (a) Firehouses (b) Correctional facilities (c) Cargo handling facilities on the waterfront (d) Wholesale food markets
